title: Crema Coffee and Bakery
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Western, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bakery and coffee cafe spot offering vegetarian and vegan options, including savory items like hummus sandwiches, soups, salads. Bakery offers about half vegan options, marked. Staff is knowledgeable about the ingredients. Coffee side offers non-dairy options, organic coffee and house made chai (ask for no honey) and natural syrups. Modern, bright decor.
